attributes.action: Deselect all remain mps and force them to stand in by elections
attributes.additional_details: This fiasco of a parliament that is three quarters remain needs to change so the result of the 2016 referendum can be delivered.
attributes.background: Obviously all mps who wish to remain in the European Union are blocking our route out. Therefore the only way is to deselect them and get the views of the public via by elections.

rejection.details: The selection of candidates is the responsibility of political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
